subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
lead_paragraph: Williams has won the first three major tournaments of 2015, and with a victory at the United States Open she would become the first woman since 1988 to win all four in a calendar year.
snippet: Williams has won the first three major tournaments of 2015, and with a victory at the United States Open she would become the first woman since 1988 to win all four in a calendar year.
